attributes.action: Build a wall/divide beween the south and the North, Somewhere near Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The North is beautiful and looked after by the people in it. The south is a mess and a the more the cancerous activities, beliefs and ethics of the south Spread the worse this country will be.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
